name: The Queen Bee's Gambit
description:
A puzzle game inspired by solo chess.  Played with mouse only.

You are leading the bees on their garden journey! Solve the puzzle to pollinate the prize flower and complete the level. There are 15 levels in total. The currently pollinated flower is highlighted in full colour. Unpollinated flowers are in grey.  Flowers that can be pollinated are highlighted in blue.

Different flowers pollinate differently:

- Tulips can pollinate in a full diagonal direction.

- Bluebells can pollinate in a horizontal direction.

- Daffodils can pollinate in a vertical direction.

- Alliums can pollinate in all directions but only within one square ranges.

Remember that flowers wilt after pollinating! Be careful not to get stuck, and if you do, click the reset icon to restart the level.

Developed by FennecFu Games. Music and sound by Crispin Joseph.

Made for the Great Spring Game Jam 2021.
